ModMetaData.name: Pawn Badge - Collection
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/iCj5o7O.png[/img]
Update and combination of Badge-mods Combined all badges-mods into one mod where you can select active sets from mod-options. If you have an idea for a badge-set, just leave a comment
Badge-mods included:
Star-Wars themed: - Imperial Army - Imperial Navy - Rebels
Texas Redhawks three mods: [list] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1752397431]Command and Conquer Brotherhood of Nod[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1752390601]Command and Conquer Global Defense Initiative[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1756882185]WWII German Army[/url] [/list]
- Added more transparent versions of GDI and Nod-badges, thanks to user fallout me
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://dsc.gg/mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/PawnBadgeCC][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/h5VwTNL.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/5xwDG6H.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] or the standalone [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Uploader[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/2176592638][img]https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/emipa606/PawnBadgeCC?label=latest%20version&style=plastic&labelColor=0070cd&color=white[/img][/url]
